title: Moroccan vegetable tagine
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '1 large red onion, very roughly chopped', '4 garlic cloves, sliced', '1 tbsp shredded fresh root ginger', '550 g (1¼ lb) butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cubed', '1 tsp ground cinnamon', '1 tsp ground cumin', '1 tsp ground coriander', '6 green cardamom pods, split open and seeds lightly crushed', '3 bay leaves', '2 cans chopped tomatoes, about 400 g each', '225 g (8 oz) large carrots, very thickly sliced', '300 ml (10 fl oz) boiling vegetable stock', '55 g (2 oz) raisins', '30 g (1 oz) dried cherries', '125 g (4½ oz) okra, sliced lengthways into 3', '1 large red pepper, roughly chopped', '1 can chickpeas, about 425 g, drained', '30 g (1 oz) toasted flaked almonds', '3 tbsp chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', 'Spicy couscous', '340 g (12 oz) couscous', '450 ml (15 fl oz) boiling vegetable stock', '1 tbsp olive oil', '1 tsp chilli sauce such as harissa', '½ tsp ground coriander', '½ tsp ground cumin']
